Articles.Content: How about two separate files for those who wish to play sandbox?

Is it too much to ask for a server on DMP?

I'm on board, although I can see a big potential problem. How will we decide which tech to unlock, and/or what buildings to upgrade, and when?

Yall are talking about refueling infrastructure to cut down on cost but you forget that inside the kerbin system, its more funds-efficient to just launch more fuel from KSC. You'd have to launch a 5-ship Jool flotilla for 3 transfer windows straight before it would pay for itself in fuel savings. If thats on your agenda, then Career is probably not an appropriate choice.

In any case, I'll throw my name in the hat for both saves if we start em up. Should we get this thread sealed and start new ones for sake of clarity/brevity?

> 
> In any case, I'll throw my name in the hat for both saves if we start em up. Should we get this thread sealed and start new ones for sake of clarity/brevity?

One for career and one for sandbox? Maybe another one for mods? Maybe? Ã¢â‚¬â€¹Just maybe?

> Maybe another one for mods? Maybe? Ã¢â‚¬â€¹Just maybe?

From experience, thats a can of worms you don't want to open.

> 
> One for career and one for sandbox? Maybe another one for mods? Maybe? Ã¢â‚¬â€¹Just maybe?

Sorry, but that destroys ease of access. I want to make this available to people who don't know how to install/use mods.

> 
> Should we get this thread sealed and start new ones for sake of clarity/brevity?

Is that really necessary?

> 
> Is that really necessary?

Was just a thought, tis why I asked.

> 
> Was just a thought, tis why I asked.

Oh, that sounded differently than I meant. Sorry.

I meant simply to ask whether that would be a good thing to do.

> 
> Is it too much to ask for a server on DMP?[/QUOTE] I think it's a good idea.
